text:
Ahmad Latifovich Alasgarov (,; born 5 October 1935 – 19 May 2015) was an Azerbaijani footballer and manager. He played as a defender from 1955 until 1965. He managed nine teams between 1966 and 2006, including the Azerbaijan national football team. He was born in Baku.
Alasgarov died after a long illness on 19 May 2015 in Odessa, Ukraine, aged 79.
